gov.usgs.anss.edgethread

Class FakeThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • gov.usgs.anss.edgethread.EdgeThread
        • gov.usgs.anss.edgethread.FakeThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class FakeThread
extends EdgeThread
    This sets up a faked up edgethead so that logging can be used from test routines that do not need to have a real EdgeThread. Typically create one of these with "-empty","FAKE", and then call setUseConsole(true) to have logging go to std out. With setUseConsole(false) it would go to log/edgemom.log or the file set with EdgeThread.setMainLogName?
